name: KidsChannel
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: kids channel
des: The Kids Channel is not just a single activity.. It has interactive educational and fun activities such as Facts/Questions, Maths questions, Jokes, Spelling, Stories, and pretty soon singing and comprehension questions which can be uploaded to enhance the deployed skill anytime. The initial version for the Hackathon includes multiple activities for Tiny children, but as stated new content can be pushed continuously to the database for the skill to pick up and deliver it once published - like a TV channel, to always keep children entertained and educated, and in the most Children friendly and interactive manner.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
